|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16DG-AC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9580; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ESR900-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The Flash chip appears to be a [[Macronix]] MX25L12845EMI-10G.
The 2.4GHz radio is using three ''[[SST]]'' ([[Microchip]]) SST12LP154 PA ICs. :The default SSID pattern (for both bands?) may be '''EnGeniusXXXXXX'''.
The power adapter shown in the FCC external photos is a ''Shenzhen Gongjin Electronics'' ([[SGE]]) :S24B12-120A150-04 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.7A max. -> 12VDC, 1.5A).
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9558 @720MHz :[[MIPS 74Kc]] 802.11bgn (3T3R) WiSoC *Storage: [[Macronix]] 16MB (NOR) Flash *Memory: [[Nanya]] 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[QCA]] QCA9558 2.4GHz (802.11bgn) :[[Atheros]] AR9580 5GHz (802.11an) *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *Power: 12V/1.5A via barrel
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/engenius/engenius_esr900_v100 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/engenius/esr900 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=237833 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
